description: The Antarctic Circumpolar Current, the planet’s most powerful ocean circulation system, could slow by 20 percent by 2050 due to melting Antarctic ice. Researchers suggest that the influx of fresh, cold water is disrupting convection, altering global ocean density. A weaker current may allow warm water to reach Antarctica, accelerating ice loss and further disrupting marine ecosystems. Experts warn that these shifts could affect ocean circulation patterns worldwide, making long-term monitoring essential for understanding future climate impacts.
title: Antarctic Ice Melt Weakens Strongest Ocean Current, Disrupting Global Circulation

description: Dhanush’s Nilavuku En Mel Ennadi Kobam (NEEK) is now available on Prime Video after its theatrical release in February. Starring debutant Pavish Narayan, the film explores love, heartbreak, and self-discovery as the protagonist attends his ex-lover’s wedding while preparing for his own arranged marriage. Directed and written by Dhanush, the film blends romance, drama, and humour, resonating with modern audiences. A sequel is hinted at, making this an intriguing watch for fans of emotional storytelling.
title: Dhanush’s NEEK Now Available on Prime Video: A Romantic Drama on Love and Heartbreak

description: Happy Face, a gripping true crime drama, is now available on JioHotstar. Based on Melissa Moore’s life and her book Shattered Silence, the series follows her as she uncovers the truth behind her father Keith Jesperson’s crimes. When an innocent man faces execution for a murder Jesperson committed, she embarks on a journey to stop a wrongful conviction. Starring Annaleigh Ashford as Melissa and Dennis Quaid as Jesperson, the show explores the devastating impact of a serial killer’s actions on their family. New episodes drop weekly, leading to the May 1 finale.
title: Happy Face Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: NASA’s Electrojet Zeeman Imaging Explorer (EZIE) mission has been launched aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 from Vandenberg Space Force Base. The trio of small satellites will map auroral electrojets, powerful currents in Earth’s atmosphere linked to solar storms. Their data will enhance space weather prediction models and help understand planetary magnetism. Instead of traditional propulsion, EZIE will use atmospheric drag for orbital adjustments. The mission is led by the Johns Hopkins Applied Physics Laboratory, with contributions from NASA Goddard and JPL.
title: NASA’s EZIE Satellites Begin Mission to Study Auroral Electrojets and Space Weather

description: Swag, a Telugu social fantasy drama starring Sree Vishnu, had a short theatrical run before its early OTT release. The film, directed by Hasith Goli, follows a treasure hunt intertwined with deception and identity. It received mixed reviews due to its complex narrative but is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video, offering audiences another chance to experience its unique storyline.
title: Swag Telugu Movie Now Streaming on Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know

description: TEST, a Tamil drama starring R. Madhavan, Nayanthara, Siddharth, and Meera Jasmine, releases on Netflix on April 4. Directed by S. Sashikanth, the film revolves around three individuals—a cricketer, a scientist, and a teacher—who face life-changing choices that test their ambitions and values. Set against the backdrop of cricket but focusing on human emotions, TEST promises a compelling watch. Produced by YNOT Studios, the film brings an engaging narrative to audiences worldwide.
title: TEST OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch R. Madhavan and Nayanthara Starrer Film Online?

description: HBO's The Last of Us returns with Season 2 in 2025, continuing Joel and Ellie’s journey. The series, based on the critically acclaimed video game, is expected to follow The Last of Us Part II. Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey reprise their roles, with new characters adding to the gripping narrative. The season will be available for streaming on JioHotstar from April 14. With heightened stakes, emotional depth, and a larger scope, the series aims to build on the success of its debut season.
title: The Last of Us Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Assassin’s Creed Shadows has crossed over one million players across platforms, Ubisoft confirmed Friday. The company did not disclose initial sales figures for the open-world action-RPG, but said the game had reached the impressive milestone on the day of release.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Crosses 1 Million Players on Launch Day, Ubisoft Confirms

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE has been spotted on a Chinese certification website, which suggests it could be launched in China soon. The listing for the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE also reveals the specifications of the power adapter supported by the handset. As per recent reports, the smartphone is expected to debut with Samsung's Exynos 2500 chipset and a design that resembles the Galaxy Z Flip 6.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE Surfaces on China's 3C Website; Charging Specifications Tipped

description: Apple is undergoing a rare shake-up of its executive ranks. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook will be appointing Vision Pro creator Mike Rockwell as the in charge of the Siri virtual assistant. Apple is yet to confirm the development.
title: Apple Shuffles AI Executive Ranks in Bid to Turn Around Siri

description: Boat Nirvana Crystl true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds were launched in India on Friday. The new earbuds have dual 10mm drivers and offer an Active Noise Cancellation feature for reducing unwanted background noise up to 32dB. They have an IPX4-rated build and feature Google fast pairing support. Boat claims that the Nirvana Crystl earbuds can offer up to 100 hours of usage, including the charging case, on a single charge.
title: Boat Nirvana Crystl TWS Earbuds With IPX4 Rating, Up to 100 Hours of Total Battery Life Launched in India

description: Mahindra & Mahindra stated that while it has tried to absorb most of the additional costs, a portion of the increase must be passed on to customers. Starting April, the company will execute new pricing across its models.
title: Mahindra & Mahindra to Hike SUV, Commercial Vehicle Prices from April

description: Sheikh Tahnoon Bin Zayed Al Nahyan of the UAE met with key officials from President Trump’s administration this week, including White House crypto czar David Sacks. Their discussions focused on expanding the role of digital currencies, particularly in international financial systems.
title: Top Officials from the US and UAE Initiate Talks on Crypto and AI Exploration: Key Details

description: Vivo Y39 5G, which was unveiled in Malaysia in February, may launch in India soon. While there hasn't been any official details regarding the launch, a recent report has suggested the expected price of the Indian variant of the smartphone as well as some of its key features. It will likely be similar to its Malaysian counterpart, that is powered by Qualcomm's 4nm octa-core Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC.
title: Vivo Y39 5G Price in India Leaked; Colour Options, Key Features Surface Online

description: Aardvark Weather, an artificial intelligence (AI) system for weather forecasting that offers several advantages over traditional methods, was unveiled on Thursday. The fully AI-driven system is said to be capable enough to replace the existing systems that require custom supercomputers and a team of experts to deliver predictions. It is also said to improve prediction accuracy and speed, and provide hyperlocal forecasts.
title: Aardvark Weather AI-Powered Weather Forecasting System Unveiled, Does Not Require Supercomputers

description: Acer TravelLite business laptops have received a refresh in India, with up to 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processors and up to 16GB of RAM. The laptops run on Windows 11 Home edition, these laptops feature a 15-inch Full HD LCD screen. The 2025 Acer TravelLite models are equipped with a 55.2Wh Li-ion battery, and are claimed to offer up to 14 hours of usage on a single charge.
title: Acer TravelLite Laptops Refreshed With 15-Inch Display, Up to 13th Gen Intel Core i7 Processors

description: Bharti Airtel and Vodafone Idea (Vi) have announced new entertainment benefits on select prepaid recharge plans ahead of the upcoming Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 season. Both telecom providers have introduced new add-on packs which can be recharged with on top of active packs to receive a complimentary subscription to JioHotstar.
title: Airtel, Vodafone Idea (Vi) Roll Out Prepaid Plans With JioHotstar Subscription Ahead of IPL 2025

description: Raids on Amazon, Flipkart warehouses operated by both firms, conducted on Wednesday by the Bureau of Indian Standards in the Tiruvallur district of the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, found that the firms had violated rules by storing, selling and exhibiting products that did not carry the BIS standard mark, a government statement said.
title: Amazon, Flipkart Found to Have Violated Indian Quality Control Rules During Warehouse Raids

description: Apple spent more than $5 billion (roughly Rs. 43,020 crore) a year on content since launching Apple TV+ in 2019 but trimmed it by around $500 million (roughly Rs. 4302 crore) last year, the report said.
title: Apple Losing Over $1 Billion a Year on Apple TV+ Streaming Service: Report

description: Apple's foldable iPhone is reportedly in development, as per recent reports, with one of its suppliers expected to benefit from the adoption of a particular material. TF Securities International analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggests that other smartphone brands might also incorporate this material into their devices to compete with the rumored foldable iPhone. While Apple has not officially confirmed plans for such a device, it is speculated to debut by the end of 2026.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone to Use Liquid Metal Materials for Improved Durability: Ming-Chi Kuo

description: The Australian Treasury has proposed rules to regulate digital asset platforms (DAPs), including exchanges, custodians, and brokerages. The government plans to implement the reforms this year, according to the Treasury.
title: Australia Proposes Regulations for Crypto Exchanges, Custody Services, Brokerage Firms: Details

description: Google Pixel debuted on Wednesday as the latest addition to the company’s affordable “a” series lineup. While the Pixel 9a still offers artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities powered by Google’s large language model (LLM), a report suggests that a lower 8GB RAM forces the handset to run a smaller version of Gemini Nano compared to its flagship counterparts.
title: Google Pixel 9a Reportedly Runs Smaller Gemini Nano LLM, Misses Out on AI Features Due to RAM Constraints

description: Huawei FreeBuds 6 were launched in China on Thursday alongside the Huawei Pura X foldable smartphone. The TWS earphones come in a water-drop shape with a semi-open ear design. They are claimed to be smaller and lighter than preceding models. The earbuds are equipped with dual drivers including 11mm dynamic drivers and micro-tweeter units. Together with the case, the FreeBuds 6 are claimed to offer a playback time of up to 36 hours.
title: Huawei FreeBuds 6 With Semi-Open Design, Up to 36 Hours Total Battery Life Launched: Price, Features

description: Itel Unicorn Max was launched in India on Friday. The smartwatch comes with a circular 1.43-inch AMOLED screen with 1,000nits peak brightness level and Always-On Display support. It supports Bluetooth calling and several health monitoring features like heart rate, blood oxygen level and sleep tracking. The watch with a stainless steel metal frame is equipped with three functional buttons including a dynamic crown.
title: Itel Unicorn Max Smartwatch With 1.43-Inch AMOLED Display Launched in India: Price, Features

description: ‘Made in India’ smartphone shipments grew 6 percent year-on-year (YoY) in 2024, according to claims by a market research firm. Samsung and Vivo dominated the market with the most shipments. Meanwhile, the former, along with Apple, accounted for a total of 94 percent of the total smartphone exports from the country.
title: ‘Made in India’ Smartphone Shipments Grew 6 Percent YoY in 2024; Samsung Retained Top Spot

description: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra is said to be in the works as the latest entrant in the company's Razr series. While we haven't heard much about its possible launch date, recent leaked renders gave us our first look at the foldable handset in green and red colours. Now, a new leak suggests a wood texture design for the yet-to-be-announced Motorola Razr 60 Ultra.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra New Design Leak Reveals Wooden Colour Variant

description: Netflix announced Spirit Crossing, its first Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO) Co-op game, at 2025 Game Developers Conference Thursday. Developed by in-house studio Spry Fox, Spirit Crossing is a cozy life sim where players work together to gather resources and build their village.
title: Netflix Announces Spirit Crossing, a 'Cozy MMO' Coming to Netflix Games in 2025

description: Indian authorities have asked Ola to explain the mismatch between its vehicle sale and registration numbers for February, which were caused by a "temporary" backlog in registrations. Ola has been facing mounting challenges, from declining sales to increased regulatory scrutiny since last year.
title: Ola Electric Says Government Sought Information on Sales-Registration Data Mismatch

description: OpenAI, on Thursday, introduced new audio models in application programming interface (API) that offer improved performance in accuracy and reliability. The San Francisco-based AI firm released three new artificial intelligence (AI) models for both speech-to-text transcription and text-to-speech (TTS) functions. The company claimed that these models will enable developers to build applications with agentic workflows.
title: OpenAI Introduces New Audio Models in API, Can Be Used for Agentic Workflows

description: Streaming platforms are packed with fresh content this week. From the high-flying action of Sky Force and the musical magic of Wicked to the gripping drama of Anora and the crime thriller Officer on Duty, there's something for every viewer. Fans of intense narratives can dive into Khakee: The Bengal Chapter, while fantasy lovers will enjoy Dragon. With a mix of genres, including crime, action, drama, and comedy, these latest OTT premieres promise an exciting watch. Check out where and when to stream them now
title: OTT Releases This Week (Mar 17 to Mar 23):  Sky Force, Wicked, Anora, Officer on Duty, and More

description: Poco has announced the global launch date of the Poco F7 Pro and Poco F7 Ultra. The phones will be unveiled in a global launch event in Singapore in the last week of March. The Xiaomi sub-brand also posted an image revealing the rear design of the handsets. They will run on Snapdragon chipsets. Additionally, an unboxing video of the handsets has gone live on YouTube showcasing design and specifications.
title: Poco F7 Ultra, Poco F7 Pro Global Launch Date Announced; Unboxing Video Leaked Online

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was teased at the Galaxy Unpacked event earlier this year and also showcased at MWC 2025. This new slim model is expected to join the Galaxy S25 series, comprising the vanilla Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra. Although Samsung is yet to announce anything about the arrival of Galaxy S25 Edge, a tipster has suggested its India launch timeline.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Tipped to Launch in India Next Month

description: Vivo X200 Ultra is tipped to launch with a triple rear camera setup including a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter. A senior company official has now teased the rear camera module of the handset, which shows the layout of the three sensors and some of their key features. Meanwhile, several other specifications of the upcoming smartphone have surfaced online again.
title: Vivo X200 Ultra Camera Module Officially Teased; Key Features Leaked Again

description: WhatsApp for Android is reportedly working on two new artificial intelligence (AI) features that could offer newer ways of interacting with the app. As per the report, the instant messaging platform is working on an AI-powered Rewrite feature that can transform a typed message across different styles. The feature is also said to proofread users’ messages before they send them.
title: WhatsApp Reportedly Developing AI-Powered Rewrite Feature, Two-Way Voice Chats with Meta AI

description: Anthropic announced the rollout of the web search functionality for Claude on Thursday. The San Francisco-based AI firm released the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot in March 2023, but so far, it could not access the Internet to find real-time information, and only had to rely on its internal knowledge database.
title: Anthropic Upgrades Claude AI Chatbot With Web Search Capability

description: Apple is reportedly expanding its workforce across various divisions in India. Since 2017, the Cupertino-based company has been manufacturing iPhone models in the country and is now aiming to reduce its reliance on China by diversifying its manufacturing processes and enhancing supply chain resilience. As part of this strategy, Apple is said to be hiring for positions in multiple Indian cities, with plans to begin local production of iPads and its AirPods true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets.
title: Apple Said to Ramp Up Hiring Ahead of Plans to Begn iPad, MacBook and AirPods Manufacturing in India

description: The overall crypto market cap slipped by 1.15 percent over the last day. Both, Bitcoin and Ether registered losses over the last day. On Friday, March 21 majority altcoins showed price drops. These include Solana, Cardano, and Dogecoin among others.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Drops to $84,500 as Most Altcoins Decline

description: Google began rolling out a new improvement for Gmail on Thursday that will help users find relevant emails easier than before. Dubbed ‘Most Relevant’, this new search result sorting feature uses artificial intelligence (AI) to bring those emails that might be more important than others to the top, ditching the traditional chronological order.
title: Google Rolling Out AI-Powered ‘Most Relevant’ Search Results Feature for Gmail

description: Infinix has announced the Note 50 Pro+ 5G globally. The handset runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate chip and boasts an AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5G is the third model in the company's Note 50 series. The Infinix Note 50 and Note 50 Pro were launched in the Indonesian market first. Infinix has also confirmed plans to unveil two additional 5G Note 50 series models later this year. The Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5G comes with Infinix AI features.
title: Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate SoC, Infinix AI Features Launched

description: iQOO has announced the launch date of iQOO Z10 in India. The Vivo sub-brand, through its social media handles, announced the launch date of the new Z series smartphone on Friday. The company has also revealed the battery capacity of the upcoming device. The iQOO Z10 will debut as a direct successor to last year's iQOO Z9 5G.
title: iQOO Z10 Confirmed to Launch in India on April 11; Battery Capacity Revealed

description: Microsoft will push for more film and TV adaptations of Xbox games, the company has said. A film based on Minecraft is set to release in theatres next month, and the Xbox parent found success with the Fallout TV series on Amazon Prime Video last year.
title: Microsoft Pushing for More Films, TV Shows Based on Xbox Games, Says Phil Spencer

description: Threads on Thursday rolled out several new features which offer improved profile personalisation, feed curation, and video playback. The Meta-owned microblogging platform now lets users customise their feed by personalising the order. By introducing topics for bio, Threads says they can also show off their favourite communities and interests to those who visit their profile.
title: Threads Rolls Out Default Feed Order, Topics for Bio and Other Features

description: Vivo V50 Lite 5G has been unveiled in select global markets. The handset shares many similarities with the 4G variant of Vivo V50 Lite, which was introduced in certain regions earlier this week. The 5G version of the Vivo V50 Lite comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, a 6,500mAh battery, and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: Vivo V50 Lite 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,500mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Infinix Note 50X 5G is scheduled to launch in India on March 27. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the pricing range of the upcoming handset has been confirmed by the brand. The successor to the Infinix Note 40X 5G will be introduced as an affordable option in the budget smartphone segment. Alongside, Infinix has also confirmed several specifications of the purported Infinix Note 50X 5G such as its battery, chipset, artificial intelligence (AI) features, and more.
title: Infinix Note 50X 5G Price Details and Chipset Confirmed Ahead of Launch in India

description: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion is expected to launch soon in India. Although the company has yet to announce the launch date or confirm the moniker, official teasers about a new Edge handset have surfaced online. The new teasers suggest key design and display features of the upcoming smartphone. Design renders and colour options of the Edge 60 Fusion, as well as some expected specifications and price details have been leaked before.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Design, Display Details Teased Ahead of Upcoming India Launch

description: Samsung officially announced the rollout of One UI 7, its Android 15-based operating system (OS), earlier this week. It has now expanded its list of devices that will be eligible to receive the update. Initially limited to the Samsung Galaxy S23 series and newer models, the South Korean technology conglomerate has added Galaxy S22, Galaxy S21 series and more phones in the supported devices list, enabling a wider audience to experience Android 15.
title: Samsung Expands One UI 7 Rollout to Include Galaxy S21, Galaxy S22 Models and Other Phones

description: With these TWS earphones, the company ventures out of its budget segment and into a slightly more premium category. At a reasonably handsome price of Rs. 7,999, these headsets offer Bose-tuned audio and a total battery life of up to 44 hours to interested buyers. Having spent the past couple of weeks with the Master Buds, I can tell you a thing or two about what to expect from them.
title: Noise Master Buds Review: Master of Some?
